items.title: Book Riot’s Deals of the Day for July 7, 2025
items.description: Delectable food writing, dark Indigenous fiction, a literary lie, and more of today's best book deals.

items.title: This Hopeful Book Will Hold Your Hand Through Times of Tide
items.description: This book found me at such a wonderful time—I'm in the middle of the tide of change, and I want it to hold my hand. I hope it holds yours.

items.title: New Tarot and Oracle Decks for 2025
items.description: These gorgeous tarot and oracle decks are calling your name.

items.title: Romance Reads for Disability Pride Month!
items.description: You get fantastic disability rep along with your HEA in these romances for Disability Pride Month. Read them this month and all year round!

items.title: Must-Read Summer Books, BIPOC Edition
items.description: The latest by literary shape-shifter Silvia Moreno-Garcia, the story of teenage moms in Florida by a former Youth Poet Laureate, and more.
